comments.author: mhowell@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: The Firefox telemetry service contains [this check](https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/rev/41c3ea3ee8eab9ce7b82932257cb80b703cbba67/toolkit/components/telemetry/core/Telemetry.cpp#1175) of a few different compile-time parameters to disable uploading any pings (but not generating them) in those cases, notably including non-official or development builds. The default browser agent should pick up this logic.
comments.text: The Firefox telemetry service contains [this check](https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/rev/41c3ea3ee8eab9ce7b82932257cb80b703cbba67/toolkit/components/telemetry/core/Telemetry.cpp#1175) of a few different compile-time parameters to disable uploading any pings (but not generating them) in those cases, notably including non-official or development builds. The default browser agent should pick up this logic.
